text:
Hello, I am perfoming A/B test and I am wondering what is treated as "Total submissions" on my page - probably Contact Form being filled in. Is there any way to change that conversion to button being clicked? My company real conversion should be "Get Started" button clicked because users are signing in for a trial there.
My company's website is <https://www.ziflow.com/>
What I ultimately need is to check how many times "Get started" button was clicked on a particular A/B version of a page. Is there any way of changing that?
And to make things clear - I need to test variations of a page based on a copy in header not variations of a CTA button.
Many thanks for any help !!! :pray: :pray: :pray:
Version A of a website <https://www.ziflow.com/-ab-variant-72d4857e-325a-4796-bb26-5067dbef948c?hs_preview=JfYnhlwv-10182829><https://www.ziflow.com/-ab-variant-72d4857e-325a-4796-bb26-5067dbef948c?hs_preview=JfYnhlwv-101828296752|...>
Version B of a website <https://www.ziflow.com/?hs_preview=FXZJpPpH-89811731285>

Hello,
I want to get all tickets data from the api endpoint. (Ref - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/tickets>) with the properties into it.
We can pass the properties into the query params. What's the maximum number of limit for the properties to be passed in single request?
Please let me know asap :pray::pray:
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1677062531352039>

Hi everyone ! Sorry if I'm not in the good channel for this request, this is my first time here on Slack :slightly_smiling_face:
I have a question about HubSpot objects, if someone can help me :pray:
Contact and Deals are associated together, okay. So we have a property "Associated Contact Email" in Deals and we can filter deals with this property.

• What if we want other properties from Contact into Deals, like "Associated Contact First name" ? I didn't find how to do it.
• Also, I associated a Custom object with Deals, and I wish to have some properties from my Custom object directly in the Deal, just like the "Associated Contact Email" property, to filter Deals, why do I can't ?
• Finally, is it possible to have some Lookup (just like in Airtable for those who know)? For example, If I associate 2 different Custom objects with Deals, I wish to find one of this Custom object inside the other, is it possible ?
Thank you for your help, I'm new in the HubSpot world :slightly_smiling_face:
Airtable is pretty awesome when it comes to things like lookup fields, unfortunately HubSpot is not as flexible
For things like numbers, i.e. deal amount you can use a calculation field to pull the info over
but for things like names and email you would have to build out a workflow to copy over that info whenever an object is associated to the object you're trying to work with

Hello, Good morning. Where should I go to get help connecting optimize press on wordpress to HubSpot? the API key isn't working and looking for the client ID and secret for the other integration method.
<@U01QVR44MEY> Thanks for your answer ! I'm trying to automatically associate records with workflow, but I think we can't except with Associ8 (which is not free..) Am I wrong ?
For the above example it doesn't sound like you need to associate a record inside of a workflow, but instead you just need to trigger the workflow whenever a record is associated

Yes sorry it was a question inside another question... For the first part, yes the workflow is perfect ! But for the second part, I need to associate custom objects together, but HubSpot allows only 2 objects together for associations, I wish that when an object is associate to another one, so we can see this association inside a third object.. Just like in Airtable in fact.. So I wanted to create a workflow to achieve that but workflow can't create associations except with Associ8, or maybe I miss something ?
I think the only way to achieve that is:
• With Associ8 in workflow (but not free)
• With Custom code in workflow (can be the best solution)
• With external code like personal lambda or Zapier, tools like that..
I just wished that HubSpot allow us to do that directly in HubSpot workflow.
Yeah so the custom coded action is probably the best bet (I build out these types of CCA on a daily basis, never have any trouble with them)
The Lambda is another option but really HubSpot custom code is just a lambda interface, so it really doesn't change much

<@U03KLUD9V3R> Thank you. The client hasn't provided a deal_ID in the records so I am having an issue where each MySQL record is syncing as a new deal ..... 725K of them :disappointed: The client has added custom fields to the Deals I may have to reach out to HighTouch to see if the clients subscription level let us add any custom code.
Thank you for your help I appreciate :slightly_smiling_face: Have a nice day !
of course, you as well

Hello all, we use a v1 endpoint `/contacts/v1/contact/createOrUpdate/email/` to upsert contacts into our instance. As of Feb 7th, we noticed a change in behavior for fields set to null in the JSON payload. It seems that the API now blanks out the contact properties if the property value is null. It used to ignore those fields. Can someone confirm this change?

Hello,
*PLEASE HELP*

does anyone can give me a hint how to solve the following:

• I have HS forms
• I added Google Tag Manager as Integration in HS & use Google Analytics 4 in GTM. 
• I use BigQuery which then should provide me with the Analytics Data matched with the HS contact_id 
How can i provide the HS contact_id as user_id to the Google Tag Manager ( & GA4)
Thank you

Hello all, this is my first experience with HubSpot, i have created a private app to access the APIs. i want to use audit-log api. and according to documentation i have assigned "content" type scope to app, and when running the API call its gives 403 error, like scope is missing.
`curl --location --request GET '<https://api.hubapi.com/cms/v3/audit-logs/>' \`
`--header 'authorization: Bearer [SECRET]'`

scope assigned.

no worries about the token i will regenerate it after resolving the issue  :grin:

I haven't run into any issues with it so it feels safe enough to use
